message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too greedy, let's try again!
That's still too skewed towards you, Bob! I want a fairer split.
Meet me in the middle, Bob! A slightly more generous offer this time.
You're getting closer, but I'm not there yet!
Not quite there, Bob! I'm not willing to give up that much more.
Last chance, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but that's as low as I'll go.
